metadata.title: CVE-2019-12973 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low
metadata.description: In OpenJPEG 2.3.1, there is excessive iteration in the opj_t1_encode_cblksfunction of openjp2/t1.c. Remote attackers could leverage thisvulnerability to cause a denial of service via a crafted bmp file. Thisissue is similar to CVE-2018-6616.
